changelog.md.Pour rappel s'il n'y a pas d'information: As a reminder if there is no information on the update, it means that it only concerns the updating of documentation, translation or text
changelog.md.Nouvelle présentation de la liste des ob: New presentation of the list of objects
changelog.md.Rajout d'un message pour penser à change: Addition of a message to think of changing the level of the API in Jeedom if you use antennas
changelog.md.Rajout de certains appareils DIVOOM (att: Addition of some DIVOOM devices (note that they require a relaunch of dependencies
changelog.md.Je ne le rajoute pas en contrôle de dépe: I do not add it in dependency control because these are just specific dependencies for them, so no need to force everyone to relaunch the dependencies
changelog.md.Rajout du niveau de batterie sur les cle: Addition of battery level on cleargrass
changelog.md.Correction d'un bug sur le dotti lié au: Correction of a bug on the dotti linked to the transition to python3
changelog.md.Séparation des devices inconnus sur la p: Separation of unknown devices on the equipment page
changelog.md.Possibilité de supprimer tous les device: Ability to delete all unknown devices in one click (only those not assigned to an object
changelog.md.Correction d'un bug sur le scan sélectif: Correction of a bug on the selective scan "Unknown
changelog.md.Changement de méthode pour l'ensemble de: Change of method for the entire playbulb range (only one conf and visuals) more dependencies compared to the different versions (now at inclusion we recover the addresses of the different methods
changelog.md.Rajout de la miscale V2 avec poids et im: Addition of miscal V2 with weight and impedance (and a whole bunch of calculated measures
changelog.md.Gestion des utilisateurs pour les calcul: User management for calculations (in the advanced config button
changelog.md.Changement de la miscale V1 (il faudra r: Change of miscal V1 (it will be necessary to recreate the users) but we gain some more info
changelog.md.Pour les playbulbs je recommande une rei: For playbulbs I recommend a reinclusion of all devices
changelog.md.Correction d'un bug sur le graph réseau: Correction of a bug on the network graph in localless mode
changelog.md.Correction d'un bug sur la régénération: Correction of a bug on the regeneration of orders on request
changelog.md.A l'inclusion les antennes d'émissions e: On inclusion the transmitting and receiving antennas are automatically filled in by the antenna that has enabled inclusion
changelog.md.Changement de la notion de présence (plu: Change of the notion of presence (no need for repetition always, no need for return state and return state time) now a presence command by antenna and local and a presence command depending on the others
changelog.md.Réglage possible maintenant du scan inte: Adjustment possible now of the scan interval and the number of scans or a device is not visible to declare it absent (gain detection presence and especially absence
changelog.md.Possibilité de mettre à jour toutes les: Possibility to update all antennas in one click
changelog.md.Possibilité de redémarrer toutes les ant: Possibility to restart all antennas in one click
changelog.md.Lors d'une mise à jour du plugin les ant: During an update of the plugin the antennas are updated and restart (can sometimes fail
changelog.md.Passage en scan passif sauf au learn (av: Passive scan except learn (with memory of the Jeedom conf to know who is who
changelog.md.Modification perso de bluepy, avec meill: Personal modification of bluepy, with better error handling (maybe more blocking on proxmow, vmware
changelog.md.Rajout d'un timeout de connection au sei: Addition of a connection timeout within bluepy itself to prevent a connection attempt from looping
changelog.md.Si le démon Local est en status NOK alor: If the Local daemon is in NOK status then the local presences are set to 0
changelog.md.Si une antenne n'a pas communiqué depuis: If an antenna has not communicated for more than a minute then the presence of this antenna is set to 0
changelog.md.Rajout de la possibilité de récupérer le: Addition of the possibility of retrieving new configurations without updating the plugin
changelog.md.Rajout d'un mode passif ou actif pour le: Addition of a passive or active mode for the scan
changelog.md.Rajout d'une option nombre de scan pour: Addition of a number of scan option to consider absent specific to the equipment (if defined will replace the global for this equipment
changelog.md.Ajout de la possibilité de définir en un: Addition of the possibility to define in one click all the equipment on an antenna or on local
changelog.md.Possibilité de choisir exactement le typ: Ability to choose exactly the type of product to include during a scan (with the possibility of choosing all
changelog.md.Début réécriture gamme playbulb pour plu: Start rewriting playbulb range to have more difference depending on the firmwares
changelog.md.Correction bug sur status démon dans cer: Bug fix on demon status in some cases
changelog.md.chaque user fait ce qu'il veut (attentio: each user does what he wants (be careful though
changelog.md.plus besoin de refresh pour les xiaomi H: no more need for refresh for xiaomi HT miflora
changelog.md.gain de batterie, meilleur portée, plus: battery gain, better range, more data
changelog.md.Je recommande de ne pas activer le refre: I recommend not activating the forced refresh which is no longer necessary unless your device seems not to advertise correctly
changelog.md.Passage de la page d'équipement en V4 co: Change from equipment page to compliant V4
changelog.md.Amélioration des xiaomi hygrothermograph: Improvement of xiaomi hygrothermograph (no need for connection for data) thank you @kipk
changelog.md.Amélioration des miflora (plus besoin de: Improvement of miflora (no need for connection for data
changelog.md.Ajout de la gestion automatique du daemo: Addition of the automatic management of the daemon on the antennas
changelog.md.Correction sur le rafraichissement des n: Correction on the refresh of the nuts (battery info
changelog.md.Correction d'un soucis sur le maximum po: Correction of a concern about the maximum possible order
changelog.md.Suppressions du check dépendances qui re: Removal of the dependencies check which will remain green anyway while waiting (remember during installation to launch the dependencies
changelog.md.Correction probable d'un bug de refresh: Probable correction of a refresh notification bug on Hygrothermograph and Miflora (probably requires relaunching dependencies for people affected
changelog.md.modification du démon pour préciser les: modification of the daemon to specify the logs
changelog.md.modification de la reconnaissance des MI: modification of the recognition of MI_SCALE V1
changelog.md.Correction d'un bug sur la modal de grap: Correction of a bug on the network graph modal if any equipment had no object
changelog.md.Rajout de la conf pour le thermomètre\/h: Addition of the conf for the thermometer / hygrometer with Xiaomi screen
changelog.md.Rajout de certaines confs awox mesh: Addition of some awox mesh confs

index.md.Ce plugin est un plugin permettant de po: This plugin is a plugin allowing you to receive events from certain bluetooth devices (such as NIU from Nodon and other
index.md.Afin d'utiliser le plugin, vous devez le: In order to use the plugin, you must download, install and activate it like any Jeedom plugin
index.md.Suite à cela vous arriverez sur cette pa: After that you will come to this page
index.md.Sur cette page vous avez peu de choses à: On this page you have little to do
index.md.Il est très vivement recommandé de lance: It is highly recommended to start the installation of the dependencies (even if they appear OK
index.md.Puis à la fin de rafraichir la page: Then at the end of refreshing the page
index.md.La chose la plus importante ici est de s: The most important thing here is to select your Bluetooth Controller
index.md.L'autre option disponible sur cette page: The other option available on this page is
index.md.Celle-ci permet de supprimer les équipem: This removes the Jeedom equipment when it is excluded
index.md.Vous pouvez aussi vérifier l'état des dé: You can also check the status of dependencies and relaunch them
index.md.Encas de soucis avec le plugin, toujours: Incase of problems with the plugin, always relaunch the dependencies even if OK when in doubt
index.md.Rendez vous dans le menu Plugins > Proto: Go to the Plugins> Home Automation Protocol menu to find the plugin
index.md.Sur cette page, vous pourrez voir les mo: On this page you can see the modules already included
index.md.Sur la partie haute de cette page, vous: On the upper part of this page, you have several buttons
index.md.ce bouton permet de mettre Jeedom en Inc: this button allows to put Jeedom in Inclusion
index.md.ce bouton permet de mettre Jeedom en Exc: this button allows to put Jeedom in Exclusion
index.md.ce bouton permet d'ouvrir la fenêtre de: this button opens the plugin configuration window
index.md.ce bouton permet d'avoir un aperçu Santé: this button allows you to have a Health overview of all your modules
index.md.Lorsque que vous cliquez sur un de vos m: When you click on one of your modules, you arrive on the configuration page of this module
index.md.Comme partout dans Jeedom vous pouvez ic: Like everywhere in Jeedom you can here on the left side
index.md.Donner un nom au module: Give a name to the module
index.md.L'activer\/le rendre visible ou non: Activate / make it visible or not
index.md.Definir un delai de surveillance de comm: Define a communication monitoring delay for certain modules
index.md.Sur la partie droite vous trouverez: On the right side you will find
index.md.Le profil de l'équipement (généralement: The profile of the equipment (generally auto detected if the module allows it
index.md.Choisir un modèle si pour ce profil plus: Choose a model if for this profile several models are available
index.md.Pour le moment, seuls certains modules s: For the moment, only certain specific modules are recognized
index.md.Les NIU s'incluent très facilement, mett: NIU is very easy to include, put Jeedom in Inclusion then press the button (as simple as that
index.md.Une fois le NIU créé, vous obtiendrez ce: Once the NIU is created, you will get this
index.md.donne une représentation numérique du ty: gives a digital representation of the type of support (ideal for scenarios
index.md.donne une représentation textuelle du ty: gives a textual representation of the type of support
index.md.D'autres modules peuvent être inclus du: Other modules can be included such as beacon NUT, fitbit bracelet, etc
index.md.Ils permettront une détection de présenc: They will allow presence detection with detection on a 1 minute slot
index.md.Bien évidemment de nombreux autres modul: Obviously many other modules will be added
index.md.Le bluetooth ayant une portée relativeme: Bluetooth has a relatively limited range, it is possible that part of your home is out of range of your antenna depending on the location of your Jeedom box
index.md.il est possible d'étendre le réseau en i: it is possible to extend the network by installing additional antennas
index.md.Le plus simple est d'utiliser un raspBer: The simplest is to use a raspBerry pi (existing or dedicated depending on the equipment you already have
index.md.On va supposer ici que le raspBerry est: We will assume here that the raspBerry is already installed with a raspbian and that ssh as well as bluetooth are activated
index.md.Vous devez vous rendre sur la page du pl: You must go to the plugin page (Plugins> Home Automation Protocol) and click on "Antennas
index.md.3) Entrez l'ip et le port (22 par défaut: 3) Enter the ip and port (22 by default
index.md.4) Entrez le nom d'utilisateur (\"pi\" p: 4) Enter the user name ("pi" by default) and the password
index.md.5) Entrez l'équipement bluetooth sur le: 5) Enter the bluetooth equipment on the pi ("hci0" on a default installation
index.md.Si il n'y a pas eu d'erreur et que votre: If there was no error and your antenna is well created in the plugin, you must now install the necessary dependencies and launch the daemon on the antenna which will take care of making the link between the Bluetooth devices at range of the antenna and the plugin (and therefore Jeedom
index.md.1) Cliquez sur le bouton \"Envoyer les f: 1) Click on the "Send files" button, it may take a little time, please wait
index.md.Un bandeau vert confirmant la réussite v: A green banner confirming success will appear, red if there has been a problem
index.md.Dans ce cas, vérifiez le log \"Blea\", v: In this case, check the "Blea" log, check the configuration (ip, user, password
index.md.2) Cliquez ensuite sur le bouton \"Lance: 2) Then click on the "Launch dependencies" button
index.md.De nouveau, cela peut prendre du temps,: Again, it may take time, please wait
index.md.Un bandeau vert confirmera la réussite o: A green banner will confirm the success or red if not (same, check the Blea log
index.md.3) Optionelle, vous pouvez récupérer man: 3) Optional, you can manually recover the dependencies installation log by clicking on "Dependencies log" and check the log, a specific log file will be available in the plugin config
index.md.4) Si tout c'est bien déroulé, vous pouv: 4) If all goes well, you can click on "Launch the daemon", after a maximum of one minute the date of the last communication should update, this means that the daemon is communicating correctly with the BLEA plugin
index.md.activez la gestion automatique du démon: activate the automatic management of the daemon by clicking on the corresponding button
index.md.Cela fera en sorte que le plugin tentera: This will cause the plugin to automatically try to restart the remote daemon in the event of a connection loss (useful if your remote pi has been temporarily disconnected from the mains or has been restarted following updates
index.md.Certains équipements comme le lywsd03 né: Some equipment like the lywsd03 needs to be added to mihome at least once before being active
